item.title: Making a new website
item.description: Why did I make this website? Great question honestly. I was not sure what to do during my PTO. I had a feeling that I wanted to do something that allowed me to practice my craft. I had an old web-app that functioned as my personal website but only had the functionality as my resume. I’ve wanted to start writing for fun for a while but never got to it. My original plan was to use medium or notion, but that was too boring and easy.
